results.title: Valsartan but not atenolol improves vascular pathology in diabetic Ren-2 rat retina.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Blockade of the @GENE_REN @GENE_24715 @@@renin@@@-angiotensin system but not antihypertensive therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ reduces vascular pathology in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:M202 @@@Ren-2@@@ retina, suggesting that @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@ is a causative factor and therapeutic target in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Wilkinson-Berka JL, Tan G, Jaworski K, Ninkovic S. Valsartan but not atenolol improves vascular pathology in diabetic Ren-2 rat retina. Am J Hypertens. 2007 Apr;20(4):423-30. PMID: 17386351
